config.name: backupStorage.image.download.timeout
config.description: timeout of command of downloading images to ceph backup storage, in seconds.

config.name: imageCache.cleanup.interval
config.description: interval to cleanup stale image cache on primary storage, in seconds.

config.name: primaryStorage.deletePool
config.description: delete all primary storage related pools when deleting the ceph primary storage

config.name: primaryStorage.mon.reconnectDelay
config.description: the delay to reconnect a primary storage ceph mon after a ping failure, in seconds

config.name: backupStorage.mon.reconnectDelay
config.description: the delay to reconnect a backup storage ceph mon after a ping failure, in seconds

config.name: primaryStorage.mon.autoReconnect
config.description: whether to automatically reconnect a ceph primary storage mon when it's unable to be pinged

config.name: backupStorage.mon.autoReconnect
config.description: whether to automatically reconnect a ceph backup storage mon when it's unable to be pinged
